name: RIS_VST_EPROC_ANS
description: This table contains the visit level questionnaire answers collected for a visit at End Procedure.

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID assigned to the patient record. This ID may be encrypted if you have elected to use enterprise reportingï¿½s encryption utility.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_DATE_REAL
columns.description: A unique contact date in decimal format. The integer portion of the number indicates the date of contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date. For example, .00 is the first/only contact, .01 is the second contact, etc.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for answers given for visit questionnaires when ending a procedure associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: END_PROC_ANS_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the visit level questionnaire answer given while ending a procedure.

columns.name: CM_CT_OWNER_ID
columns.description: The Community ID (CID) of the instance that owns this contact. This is populated only if you use IntraConnect.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: The unique contact serial number for this contact. This number is unique across all patient encounters in your system. If you use IntraConnect, this is the Unique Contact Identifier (UCI).
